description: Number of nonnegative integer pairs (i,j) with binomial(i+r,r) + binomial(j+r,r) <= binomial(n+r,r), r=2.
prog: (PARI) a(n) = {nb = 0; for (i=0, n, for (j=0, n, if (binomial(i+2, 2) + binomial(j+2, 2) <= binomial(n+2, 2), nb++););); return (nb);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 10 2013
author: Klaus Strassburger (strass(AT)ddfi.uni-duesseldorf.de), Jan 21 2000
